content.question: The pattern shown in the table was partly an effect of which of the following changes in the economy of western Europe?

choices.label: The breakdown of traditional economic systems and the increasing commercialization of agriculture
The decreasing importance of agricultural activity as a contributor to the overall economy
The improvement of wages and working conditions for skilled laborers
The declining importance of grain as a primary foodstuff

content.answer: The breakdown of traditional economic systems and the increasing commercialization of agriculture

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
